Wellcome to the course <b>Learning Social Media Analytics</b> that runs in the academic year, 2021/22 at the University of Croatian Studies, Zagreb. The course and repository materials are maintained by Luka Šikić, PhD. The course <b>Learning Social Media Analytics</b> is made for graduate level students from humanistic, interdisciplinary or/and social science background that have understanding of introductory statistics. The course uses R and Python programming language but doesnt require prior knowledge of the programming syntax.
